comments.author: christina
comments.content: Oh, I absolutely love banana muffins (and banana nut bread). I don't think I'd ever seen any of them before I got to the States, but wow -- have had a lot of them since then. I agree, though, that most muffin recipes are too sweet. Will try your recipe as soon as possible.

comments.author: Vegan
comments.content: What an informative post and i cant wait to try it. Will the muffins be so tender if i add buttermilk?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: If you want to add buttermilk, try this recipe: https://herbivoracious.com/2012/03/banana-buttermilk-and-brown-sugar-muffins-triple-b-muffins-recipe.html (you can always bring over the crumb top from the first one.)
